dict.string: Hello there üëãüèº Welcome to Foursquare! We can't wait for you to get started with your new ${DEVICE_MODEL_NAME}!

Every macOS device at Foursquare is equipped with JumpCloud system agent. This agent allows IT to bind your JumpCloud identity to your mac. At the end of this workflow you will use your JumpCloud user "shortname" and JumpCloud password to log into this Mac.
Are you a new or existing Foursquare employee?
Activate your macOS account with JumpCloud!
In order to set your mac with your JumpCloud user shortname and JumpCloud password, simply enter your full "@foursquare.com" email address in the text field below.
Oh no! Something is not quite right!
Incorrect or empty value - please re-enter your "@foursquare.com" email address
Incorrect - please re-enter your secret word
Password must have at least 10 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number.
After you've entered your full "@foursquare.com" email address, secret word, and new password. Click the "ACTIVATE" button to proceed:
Activate your macOS account with JumpCloud!
In order to set your mac with your JumpCloud user shortname and JumpCloud password, simply enter your full "@foursquare.com" email address in the text field below.
Oh no! Something is not quite right!
Incorrect or empty value - please re-enter your "@foursquare.com" email address
After you've entered your full "@foursquare.com" email address. Click the "ACTIVATE" button to proceed:
JumpCloud is now setting up your macOS account...

Your user shortname for this mac is all the text before the "@foursquare.com" portion of your full email address. Therefore, your user shortname for this Mac would be "${JCUsername}". Keep this in mind when logging into your Mac.
Everything appears to be in order! üéâü•≥üéä
The system needs to take a moment to make a few "finishing touches".

Please select LOGOUT, you will be taken to the login window. At this next login window, use your JumpCloud user shortname, and JumpCloud password to log into your macOS account, and proceed with additional automated setup!
Oh no! Something is not quite right!
Activate your macOS account with JumpCloud!
In order to set your mac with your JumpCloud user shortname and JumpCloud password, simply enter your full "@foursquare.com" email address in the text field below.
Oh no! Something is not quite right!
Incorrect or empty value - please re-enter your "@foursquare.com" email address
After you've entered your full "@foursquare.com" email address. Click the "ACTIVATE" button to proceed:
If you are a new hire, click the "NEW HIRE" button to proceed:
Installing the JumpCloud system agent for macOS
JumpCloud is activating your macOS user account
JumpCloud is creating your macOS user account
